info:
Polls Assembly Instance 100 Attribute 3 every 500 ms and publishes to MQTT.
Usage: Import into Node-RED, configure the CIP connection, and update the MQTT out node credentials/topic as needed.
Depends on node-red-contrib-cip-ethernet-ip and Node-RED's built-in MQTT nodes.

name: PM500 assembly read to MQTT
info: Polls assembly 100 attribute 3 twice per second, converts binary watts reading to JSON, and publishes on `pm500/assembly/100/attribute/3`. Ensure MQTT broker credentials are set on the downstream MQTT out node before deploying.

name: Prepare CIP read
info: Builds the envelope expected by node-red-contrib-cip-ethernet-ip for polling the PM500 assembly attribute.

name: Assembly 100 Attr 3
info: Uses the configured CIP connection to fetch the binary payload from the PM500. Requires node-red-contrib-cip-ethernet-ip.

name: Format for MQTT
info: Converts the binary watts reading into a JSON payload suitable for MQTT subscribers.
